greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Inverse permutation to A333776.
link: Rémy Sigrist, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..8192
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
program: (PARI) a(n, base=2) = { my (d=Vecrev(digits(n, base)), v=0); forstep (k=#d, 1, -1, v += d[k]*base^(k-1); if (d[k], d=Vecrev(d[1..k-1]))); v }
results.author: _Rémy Sigrist_, Apr 05 2020
